name: BluetoothRemoteGATTCharacteristic.startNotifications
description: The BluetoothRemoteGATTCharacteristic.startNotifications() method returns a Promise to the BluetoothRemoteGATTCharacteristic instance when there is an active notification on it.
content:
This is an experimental technology
Check the Browser compatibility table carefully before using this in production.

TheBluetoothRemoteGATTCharacteristic.startNotifications()method returns a Promise to theBluetoothRemoteGATTCharacteristic instancewhen there is an active notification on it.
